artist: Designer: William Ernst Hentschel; Manufacturer: Rookwood Pottery
creditline: Gift of Marion and Lila Nelson
description: blue and pink glaze with 6 Art Nouveau-style applied and incised flowers; body flares out to wide base; downward curve in handle toward front; square knob on lid at one edge

title: Teapot, from a tea set
